author: Inside Edition
description: Just in time for the holidays, two dogs left for dead and several other lucky pups get a new start at life thanks to pilots volunteering their time. After being discovered, Butter and Scotch were taken to the Chesterfield County Animal Services in South Carolina. The organization reached out to Pilots to the Rescue for help, and the non-profit volunteered to fly and drive to pick them and 38 other animals up so they wouldn't be euthanized. Inside Edition Digital's Andrea Swindall has more.
title: Volunteer Pilots Fly In To Save 40 Animals From Euthanasia

author: Inside Edition
description: These are strange stories about porta-potties. In 2018, the wind was so strong in Denver that it lifted porta-potties in a park and sent them flying into the air. In 2023, police cars poured onto a golf course to go after a suspect. But there was no need to hurry because he was trapped in a Porta-potty. In 2021, a 7-and-a-half-foot-tall loo was decorated with Christmas lights to brighten the holiday spirits. Inside Edition Digital's Andrea Swindall has more.
title: Strange Stories About Porta-Potties
